moves.2. d4: On the recommendation of guess who. Of course, she didn't tell J. B. what comes next.
moves.2... f5: I had to struggle to keep my face straight at this oddball countergambit.
moves.3. Bc4: I was thinking 3 Q-R5 ch, but I wasn't the one playing the game.
moves.5. Qxe5#: That was fast. We still had time to play a rubber of bridge before lunch was over.
